UnifiedEmailParticipant.name: UnifiedEmailParticipant
UnifiedEmailParticipant.description: Represents a participant in an email.

ActivityId.description: ID of the email the person is participating in.

ChannelAddress.description: Email address of the participant. The email address is captured at the time of the communication; it doesn’t change if the contact’s email address is updated later.

PersonId.description: ID of the person participating in the email.
